dict.acceptation: （把…）拍摄（成）电影[电视等]；上镜头；
（给…）覆上一薄层；生薄膜；变得朦胧；

sent.orig: A sports film is a film genre that uses sport as the theme of a film.
sent.trans: 体育电影是把体育作为影片主旋律的一种电影类型。

sent.orig: The film image, film length and film area were recorded by a CCD camera.
sent.trans: 同时，CCD相机记录了油膜的形状、长度和面积变化。

sent.orig: It is used for vertically cutting cellophane paper, PP film, PE film, compound film, aluminum coated.
sent.trans: 用于纵向分切玻璃纸、聚丙烯膜、聚乙烯膜、复合膜、镀铝膜、热封膜、纸及其他塑料薄膜。

sent.orig: Factory supplier: agriculture film, package film film, etc.
sent.trans: 厂家生产地膜、农用薄膜、包装膜等。

sent.orig: Right-reading film: When facing the film's emulsion, if the image is readable, it is right-reading film.
sent.trans: 正读菲林：面向菲林的感光膜时，若影像可以读出，则上正读菲林。不然则是反读菲林。
